title: OH! THEY finally made Epidemic Singed
body:
If anyone hasn't seen the upcoming skins in the patch notes, they're releasing these skins for Kayle, Nocturne, and Singed: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2047125

I remember this thread from ages ago:
http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2047125 I had always thought it was such a cool Singed skin, and I'm glad they finally realized it as an official skin.
